script","$invalid":false,"settings":{"function":"run","source":"/**\n            * All input variables needs to be passed as function param;\n            * Objects received as param needs to be parsed. Ex.: JSON.parse(inputVariable1);\n            * Objects returned needs to be stringfied. Ex.: JSON.stringify(inputVariable1);\n            **/\n          function run(resposta) {\n              \n              /* Setei manualmente na variavel resposta o retorno da minha api, acrescida de uma aspas simples no come√ßo e no fim, para ser uma string Json, e \n               assim o scirpt n√£o quebrar.\n               Apesar do retorno da api ser um json v√°lido, o script quebrava ao fazer o parse nela pelo motivo de n√£o ser uma string josn. A fun√ß√£o no C# que \n               serializa o retorno  da api tamb√©m n√£o estava transformando em uma string Json, como faz a fun√ß√£o stringify no javascript.\n               Infelizmente n√£o tive tempo para pesquisar uma melhor solu√ß√£o para esse problema.\n               Por√©m,  fora do builder o  script funciona normalmente com o retorno da api sem fazer o parse inicial. Aprarentemete dentro do builder ele n√£o consegue \n               trabalhar assim      \n                */ \n               \n               resposta =  '[{\"language\":\"C#\",\"created_at\":\"2013-10-25T13:04:51Z\",\"description\":\"Provides a simple abstraction for implementing the repository and unit of work patterns for data-enabled applications\",\"full_name\":\"takenet/library.data\",\"owner\":{\"avatar_url\":\"https://avatars.githubusercontent.com/u/4369522?v=4\"}},{\"language\":\"C#\",\"created_at\":\"2013-10-25T15:18:07Z\",\"description\":\"Provides a simple logging interface for applications and some basic implementations of this interface\",\"full_name\":\"takenet/library.logging\",\"owner\":{\"avatar_url\":\"https://avatars.githubusercontent.com/u/4369522?v=4\"}},{\"language\":\"C#\",\"created_at\":\"2013-11-29T09:16:51Z\",\"description\":\"Forking original c# port\",\"full_name\":\"takenet/libphonenumber-csharp\",\"owner\":{\"avatar_url\":\"https://avatars.githubusercontent.com/u/4369522?v=4\"}},{\"language\":\"C#\",\"created_at\":\"2014-01-13T11:38:38Z\",\"description\":\"Radar de tecnologias takenet\",\"full_name\":\"takenet/Takenet.Radar\",\"owner\":{\"avatar_url\":\"https://avatars.githubusercontent.com/u/4369522?v=4\"}},{\"language\":\"C#\",\"created_at\":\"2014-01-28T10:31:10Z\",\"description\":\"Takenet score system\",\"full_name\":\"takenet/Takenet.ScoreSystem\",\"owner\":{\"avatar_url\":\"https://avatars.githubusercontent.com/u/4369522?v=4\"}}]'\n               var events = new Array();\n              \n               var obj =  JSON.parse(resposta);\n               obj.forEach(function (event) {\n              \n               events.push({\n                    header: {\n                        type: \"application/vnd.lime.media-link+json\",\n                        value: {\n                            title: event.full_name,\n                            text:  event.description,\n                            type: \"image/jpeg\",\n                            uri: event.owner.avatar_url\n                        }\n                    }\n                \n                  });\n            });\n    \n        var saida = {\n            itemType: \"application/vnd.lime.document-select+json\",\n            items: events\n        }\n\n     return JSON.stringify(saida)\n        \n  \n   \n}","inputVariables":["resposta"],"outputVariable":"resp","LocalTimeZoneEnabled":false},"conditions":[],"continueOnError":false}],"$leavingCustomActions":[],"$inputSuggestions":[],"$defaultOutput":{"stateId":"29759fbe-dce7-4865-9904-5416b2c66143","$invalid":false},"$tags":[],"id":"cd1b9f19-1304-4624-bdc2-cdac8646808a","root":false,"$title":"Desafio","$position":{"top":"523px","left":"1487px"},"$invalidContentActions":false,"$invalidOutputs":false,"$invalidCustomActions":false,"$invalid":false}}
